title: Possible LP Glitch?
body: So this is my first ranked season, I am currently bronze 5, currently my LP sits at 62, if I lose my next ranked game my LP will fall down to 43, if I lose again after that however, I won't lose LP, no matter how many times I lose in a row  and when I win again, at the moment I get 19Lp so the LP for wins and losses is equal so I assume I play at a bronze 5 level... I have contacted riot about this and was told it must be a visual glitch cause on their end I'm still losing LP, I began checking other sites like op.gg.oce, lol-mmr.com and lolking, all of which show your LP, all 3 sites show the same LP as shown on my profile. This glitch has been going on for roughly 2-3 months, I contacted riot when it first began happening, originally I wouldn't fall below 12LP... it's slowly gotten higher . I have no idea how much LP I have so I have no idea how far I am from going into my promos, any advice on what I can do?

replies.body: I checked my LP on other sites etc cause after a loss, no LP was lost. I don't exactly have evidence of me losing games but not LP cause my last ranked game I played I won... and haven't played ranked much before that to show.

>Why do you want to lose LP anyway?

So, if you win a game, do you also not get LP for it?

PS: Use "Reply", otherwise I don't get notification.

I'm not understanding what's happening. "I'm still losing LP, I began checking other sites like op.gg.oce, lol-mmr.com and lolking, all of which show your LP, all 3 sites show the same LP as shown on my profile." Why would you think you're still losing LP if both your profile and those third-party sites say that you aren't? Is there any evidence as to this happening?

Nevertheless, if you play and win games, you'll get to promos.
